INSTRUCTIONS.STEP_3: Watch the ad to change the cover in the EPUB
INSTRUCTIONS.STEP_4: Save or share the updated EPUB
INSTRUCTIONS.STEP_4_DESC: Once ready, you can save it to your device or share it directly with the Kindle app for a smoother transition.
INSTRUCTIONS.STEP_5_DESC: You can also send it from your browser using the Send to Kindle web tool.
INSTRUCTIONS.TIP: For best results, use high-resolution images and make sure ads are disabled on your Kindle device.
